Paracorr¶

Script to calculate seismic ambient noise correlation functions. Called as a python program the script accepts the path to a yaml parameter file, reads it and calls the paracorr function with these parameters.

The structure of the parameter file and the functionality of the script are described in the following tutorial Ambient Noise correlation.

@author: Christoph Sens-Schönfelder

@copyright: The MIIC Development Team (sens-schoenfelder@gfz-potsdam.de)

@license: GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 3 (http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html)

Created on Oct 20, 2017

Function¶

paracorr Computation of noise correlation functions
